name: Elloria Alpha
description:
Note!: You will need an Oculus Quest to run it, and it will need to be sideloaded with SideQuest

This is a very rough prototype of a fantasy based game I'd like to create. You have the option to choose from a few classess, ranged or melee. There's an island with a tavern and some goblin infested run down villages.

Suuper rough right now, though eventually I'd like to make this a game about working with other players. Kill low level monsters, buy enough supplies and then form your party and enter a cave for a real challenge (not in game yet)
